definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: prob. subdue (NH overturn, hold under, compel; Aram. [[כְּפָא]], id.; kpo0 incline (as face to ground), overturn; As. kipû perh. id., Dl:HWB 346; cf. Ar. kafa0’a overturn, turn back);—only

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. [[מַתָּן בַּסֵּתֶר יִכְפֶּה־אָָף]] Pr 21:14 a gift in secret subdueth anger (so Thes RobGes; Ew beugt: Fl De averteth, from the Ar., is more remote; LXX a)natre/pei, cf. NH).
